document.full_text: the u.s. treasury made a small profit when it sold a portion of its shares in american international group inc on tuesday, but it was unclear how its investment in the beleaguered insurer will ultimately fare.
document.title: aig share sale raises $8.7 billion after record bailout
lines_and_colors: the u.s. treasury made a small profit when it sold a portion of its shares in american international group inc on tuesday, but it was unclear how its investment in the beleaguered insurer will ultimately fare.
